attributes.action: Give Devolved Powers to Counties and Cities
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As regional assemblies in England have proven to be unpopular, why not give some devolved powers to the English county and unitary authorities and to the Core Cities of Birmingham, Bristol, Leeds, Liverpool, Manchester, Newcastle, Nottingham and Sheffield? The powers that could be devolved would be Economic Development, Education, Strategic Planning, Health and Housing.
